guide.introduction: so easy, everything you need will be available at your local craftstore
guide.introduction_rendered: so easy, everything you need will be available at your local craftstore

lines.text: Get your supplies from JoAnn or some local craftstore
lines.text_raw: Get your supplies from JoAnn or some local craftstore

lines.text: Get and cut your template using my DIY hand-drawn stencil guide only you have a printed design instead
lines.text_raw: Get and cut your template using my DIY hand-drawn stencil guide only you have a printed design instead

lines.text: Tape it on to the equipment being tattoed
lines.text_raw: Tape it on to the equipment being tattoed

lines.text: let the material used to get the design and give time to dry if needed
lines.text_raw: let the material used to get the design and give time to dry if needed

lines.text: Enjoy your equipment tattooed your way
lines.text_raw: Enjoy your equipment tattooed your way

guide.subject: Example: Logic Board
guide.summary: mod a laptop,monitor,desktop,netbook with a permenant logo if used non-roughly otherwise it will need to be redone from time to time
guide.title: permaneant e-tattos
